1.text: Combine equal amounts of white vinegar and distilled water.

2.text: Spritz the vinegar solution onto a microfiber cloth.

3.text: Rub down the mirror in a zig-zag motion.

4.text: Wipe away any marks with a clean microfiber cloth.

5.text: Mix water, vinegar, rubbing alcohol, and essential oil together in a spritzing bottle.

6.text: Spray the mixture onto an unused cloth or paper towel.

7.text: Rub down spots that have a lot of gunk and grime built up.

8.text: Scrub the entire surface of the mirror with zig-zag motions.
